::DarkMouse::

"I don't threaten, I promise.  Hurt him and I kill you. Assassin or not.  
Don't push your luck."
She glared at him for a moment.
"I suggest that you step down now or suffer the consiquences.  I have no 
choice but to obey orders, if Megatron or Scorponok order me to step down 
then I would.  That's true loyalty.  But I question your loyalt and your 
motives on this matter.  You say that you want to join us, then prove it. 
Stand Down Now!"

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars



"I wouldn't hurt your pathetic boyfriend if you payed me! totally not worth
the time. Besides, stick me in teh face with that knife, and my sword goes
through your ribs, got that?" Sinister said. Sinesis laughed.

"My brother is much smarter than he looks, smarter than your boy, mouse."
Sinesis said. Sinister laughed and punched himself in the face, beore
breaking out laughing again.

"What's so funny?" Sinesis asked.

"She THREATENED me! ahahahaha!" L=aughed Sinister. Sinesis shook his head...
